nodes.text: Glearius Parvil was a male Senator in the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire. He was a sympathizer of the Sith and wished to break ties with the Jedi Order in order to open relations with the Sith Empire instead.

Several members of a movement known as the True Republic sought to sabotage Parvil by stealing an important parcel from him to ensure that his ideals did not come to pass and so they sent a Republican individual to do the job.

The individual upon trying to steal the parcel was caught by a Senate page who did not approve of the individual's actions against the republic's regulations and then demanded that the individual return the parcel in exchange for a fake parcel to lead the True Republic movement astray and maintain the democracy of the Republic.

Parvil is only mentioned in the Star Wars: The Old Republic quest "The Politics of Dissent". The player can also choose to sabotage Parvil which will reveal that his Senate Page was also a supporter of the Sith Empire and hoped for the senator's plan to succeed.
